text:
Trump thinks #coronavirus disappears if he stops testing for it. If the absurdity isn’t obvious, replace “coronavirus” with “cancer” and say that sentence out loud.

Maybe he just doesn’t care about Americans dying if he can manipulate the number of confirmed cases.
